arts.ttl: Barcelona suffer new blow as 29-year-old player sent home with illness ahead of Olympiacos game
arts.sum: The start of the 2025-26 season has not really been easy for FC Barcelona as they have had to contend with injuries to several of their important players, including the likes of Robert Lewandowski, Lamine Yamal, Raphinha, Fermin Lopez, Gavi, Dani Olmo, Alejandro Balde, and Joan Garcia. arts.ttl: Olympiacos coach hails Barcelona midfielder ahead of UCL clash – “Makes you forget Xavi, Iniesta”
arts.sum: Olympiacos coach Jose Luis Mendilibar is no stranger to facing Barcelona, having registered a woeful record against the Catalan side during the course of his coaching career. But he will be looking to move past that record when Olympiacos take on a struggling Barcelona team in the Champions League this midweek. arts.ttl: Hansi Flick tries a new Barcelona attacking trident in training before Olympiacos clash
arts.sum: Barcelona’s win over Girona at the weekend required Hansi Flick to bring an unconventional substitute in Ronald Araujo to score the winner as the striker – a measure that worked out but shows how grave a situation the club is facing in terms of injuries.
